# uptimekuma_notification_pushover (Resource)

Pushover notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_pushover" "example" {
  name      = "My Pushover Notification"
  is_active = true
  user_key  = var.pushover_user_key
  app_token = var.pushover_app_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_token` (String, Sensitive) Pushover application token
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `user_key` (String, Sensitive) Pushover user key

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `device` (String) Device name to receive notifications
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `priority` (String) Priority level for notifications
- `sounds` (String) Notification sound
- `sounds_up` (String) Notification sound when monitor is up
- `title` (String) Notification title
- `ttl` (String) Time to live for notifications

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
